WorkItem.Description:
Hi,

I compared PHPExcel's CHIDIST output with that of other online applications and PHP code:

1. http://www.danielsoper.com/statcalc3/calc.aspx?id=11
2. http://graphpad.com/quickcalcs/PValue1.cfm
3. PHP code I happened to find to compute the P-Value using the Critical Value and the degrees of Freedom (same parameters CHIDIST uses): http://statistical-research.com/chi-square-distribution-php/

Of the three trials below, the first two showed that CHIDIST returned the same output as the other applications. However, the third did not match.


CHIDIST(14.07,7) - OK
returned 0.049950250317483
other application returned a very close approximation

CHIDIST(25.989,18) - OK
returned 0.10000969393677
other application returned a very close approximation

CHIDIST(65,2) - Not OK
returned 0.41928893851469
other application returned a number less than 0.001 (after implementing the PHP code I encountered, it returned 5.6040616591702E-11

Is there an error in PHPExcel's CHIDIST in some cases?

Comments.Message: Yes, it's possible that there is
